title: Refined Lead Production, Total Primary for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1929-1945 (2)--Original Data, 1945-1955 Data Represent Production From Domestic And Foreign Ore Including Some Secondary Material Passing Through Primary Smelters. Source: American Bureau Of Metal Statistics Yearbook, 1947 And Following Issues; Survey Of Current Business, Monthly Issues Through September 1955, And Statistical Supplements Beginning With 1949 Issue.

This NBER data series m01245b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01245b
